name: TUTK - Bolt Jam 4 Entry
description:
The Ultimate Time Killer 

is a visual "game" that you can play so that you can....kill some time!  

  • Have a meeting your waiting for?  zoom in to see all the detail!
  • Waiting for some colonists to build a large settlement and don't care about their well being in the interim?  spawn s'more pixels.  
  • Need to waste the day away because it's rainy outside?  Try the awesome rotation feature!

This is a "game" submitted for the Bolt Jam 4 that utilizes the "Time Killer" theme.  The jam itself has 3 themes

1. New Beginnings

2. Magic Bullet

3. Time Killer

How to Play

Load it up and play with the Options in the cool shiny slideout menu!  *sups easy*

The light grey wall is the heating device so the pixels will flow upward from that panel no matter the rotation.  Watch, play, enjoy!

Please leave comments below about features you'd like to see in the game!

Features I want to Implement

- "Sticky" pixels to mimic lava lamps

- Drawing walls in the jar

- Different jar types

Assets

Bolt 1.4.0f11 - https://ludiq.io/bolt
